markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Overcrowd](/Feats.aspx?ID=5665) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=769" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 31 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

As long as you are Small, you can end your movement in the same square as a Small ally. Only two creatures total can share the same space when using this ability or a similar one.

<title level="2">Overcrowd leads to...</title>
[Shinstabber](/Feats.aspx?ID=5668)
name: Overcrowd
